scripts.next:update: bun add next@latest react@latest react-dom@latest eslint-config-next@latest
scripts.commit: git pull && bun update && bun run vercel && bun mylint && read -p 'Descriptions Commit: ' message && git add . && echo -n "$message - " && node getTime.js | xargs -I {} git commit -m "$message - {}" && git push
